title: How older adults experience the age-friendliness of Skopje: Results of the validation of the AFCCQ for use in North Macedonia and a representative survey
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Daniel Pavlovski, Jeroen Dikken, Elisabeta Bajrami Ollogu, Joost van Hoof
